name: SF In-Home Supportive Services (IHSS) Public Authority
description: The IHSS interviews, registers and refers home care workers; administers medical plans and dental plans for IHSS workers and assists them in accessing home care training resources. The IHSS recruits home care workers who speak English, Vietnamese, Spanish, Russian and Chinese (Cantonese, Mandarin). Services in other languages can be arranged. The Public Authority offers free home care training and educational workshops to qualified IHSS workers.
